document.docAuthor: Hielkema, Auke J. & Hielkema, Meindert A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

bibRefCitation.author: Linnaeus
bibRefCitation.refString: Linnaeus, C. 1758. Systema naturae per regna tria naturae, secundum classes, ordines, genera, species, cum characteribus, differentiis, synonymis, locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata. Laurentii Salvii; Stockholm. 823 p.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note. Two presently recognized subspecies of
Oxysternon ( Oxysternon ) festivum
have been described, one of which occurs in the research area. The other one is
O. ( O. ) festivum nigerrimum Arnaud, 2002
(recorded from Trinidad and Tobago ).

Subspecies
Oxysternon ( Oxysternon ) festivum festivum ( Linnaeus, 1758 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Oxysternon ( Oxysternon ) festivum viridanum Arnaud 2002c: 71
( Brazil , Venezuela ( EO )) -
Edmonds and Zídek 2004: 12
(syn. nov.)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note 1. Hielkema (2017: 4) shows that
Scarabaeus festivus
(now
Oxysternon ( Oxysternon ) festivum
) is described in Linnaeus (1758: 350) rather than in Linnaeus (1767: 552) , invalidates the lectotype designated in Edmonds and Zídek (2004: 12) , and designates a new lectotype .

Note 2. According to Arnaud (2002c: 71) and Edmonds and Zídek (2004: 12) , the specimens of
Oxysternon festivum
from Trinidad and Tobago as mentioned in Gillet (1911b: 87) and Blackwelder (1944: 210) belong to the subspecies
O. festivum nigerrimum
.
